name: answerShippingQuery
description: If you sent an invoice requesting a shipping address and the parameter is_flexible was specified, the Bot API will send an Update with a shipping_query field to the bot. Use this method to reply to shipping queries. On success, True is returned.

properties.name: ok
properties.description: Pass True if delivery to the specified address is possible and False if there are any problems (for example, if delivery to the specified address is not possible)

properties.name: shipping_query_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered

properties.name: shipping_options
properties.description: Required if ok is True. A JSON-serialized array of available shipping options.

properties.name: error_message
properties.description: Required if ok is False. Error message in human readable form that explains why it is impossible to complete the order (e.g. "Sorry, delivery to your desired address is unavailable'). Telegram will display this message to the user.

name: answerPreCheckoutQuery
description: Once the user has confirmed their payment and shipping details, the Bot API sends the final confirmation in the form of an Update with the field pre_checkout_query. Use this method to respond to such pre-checkout queries. On success, True is returned. Note: The Bot API must receive an answer within 10 seconds after the pre-checkout query was sent.

properties.name: ok
properties.description: Specify True if everything is alright (goods are available, etc.) and the bot is ready to proceed with the order. Use False if there are any problems.

properties.name: pre_checkout_query_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered

properties.name: error_message
properties.description: Required if ok is False. Error message in human readable form that explains the reason for failure to proceed with the checkout (e.g. "Sorry, somebody just bought the last of our amazing black T-shirts while you were busy filling out your payment details. Please choose a different color or garment!"). Telegram will display this message to the user.

name: LabeledPrice
description: This object represents a portion of the price for goods or services.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Price of the product in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

properties.name: label
properties.description: Portion label

name: Invoice
description: This object contains basic information about an invoice.

properties.name: total_amount
properties.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

properties.name: start_parameter
properties.description: Unique bot deep-linking parameter that can be used to generate this invoice

properties.name: description
properties.description: Product description

properties.name: title
properties.description: Product name

name: ShippingAddress
description: This object represents a shipping address.

properties.name: post_code
properties.description: Address post code

properties.name: street_line2
properties.description: Second line for the address

properties.name: street_line1
properties.description: First line for the address

properties.name: city
properties.description: City

properties.name: state
properties.description: State, if applicable

properties.name: country_code
properties.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

name: OrderInfo
description: This object represents information about an order.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Optional. User name

properties.name: phone_number
properties.description: Optional. User's phone number

properties.name: email
properties.description: Optional. User email

properties.name: shipping_address
properties.description: Optional. User shipping address

name: ShippingOption
description: This object represents one shipping option.

properties.name: prices
properties.description: List of price portions

properties.name: title
properties.description: Option title

properties.name: id
properties.description: Shipping option identifier

name: SuccessfulPayment
description: This object contains basic information about a successful payment.

properties.name: provider_payment_charge_id
properties.description: Provider payment identifier

properties.name: telegram_payment_charge_id
properties.description: Telegram payment identifier

properties.name: invoice_payload
properties.description: Bot specified invoice payload

properties.name: total_amount
properties.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

properties.name: shipping_option_id
properties.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

properties.name: order_info
properties.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

name: ShippingQuery
description: This object contains information about an incoming shipping query.

properties.name: shipping_address
properties.description: User specified shipping address

properties.name: invoice_payload
properties.description: Bot specified invoice payload

properties.name: from
properties.description: User who sent the query

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique query identifier

name: PreCheckoutQuery
description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.

properties.name: invoice_payload

properties.name: total_amount
properties.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code

properties.name: from
properties.description: User who sent the query

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique query identifier

properties.name: shipping_option_id
properties.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

properties.name: order_info
properties.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

name: PassportData
description: Describes Telegram Passport data shared with the bot by the user.

properties.name: credentials
properties.description: Encrypted credentials required to decrypt the data

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array with information about documents and other Telegram Passport elements that was shared with the bot

name: PassportFile
description: This object represents a file uploaded to Telegram Passport. Currently all Telegram Passport files are in JPEG format when decrypted and don't exceed 10MB.

properties.name: file_date
properties.description: Unix time when the file was uploaded

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: File size in bytes

properties.name: file_unique_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.

properties.name: file_id
properties.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file

name: EncryptedPassportElement
description: Describes documents or other Telegram Passport elements shared with the bot by the user.

properties.name: hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded element hash for using in PassportElementErrorUnspecified

properties.name: type
properties.description: Element type. One of “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “address”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”, “phone_number”, “email”.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Optional. Base64-encoded encrypted Telegram Passport element data provided by the user, available for “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport” and “address” types. Can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

properties.name: phone_number
properties.description: Optional. User's verified phone number, available only for “phone_number” type

properties.name: email
properties.description: Optional. User's verified email address, available only for “email” type

properties.name: files
properties.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with documents provided by the user, available for “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration” and “temporary_registration” types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

properties.name: front_side
properties.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the front side of the document, provided by the user. Available for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card” and “internal_passport”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

properties.name: reverse_side
properties.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the reverse side of the document, provided by the user. Available for “driver_license” and “identity_card”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

properties.name: selfie
properties.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the selfie of the user holding a document, provided by the user; available for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card” and “internal_passport”. The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

properties.name: translation
properties.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with translated versions of documents provided by the user. Available if requested for “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration” and “temporary_registration” types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

name: EncryptedCredentials
description: Describes data required for decrypting and authenticating EncryptedPassportElement. See the Telegram Passport Documentation for a complete description of the data decryption and authentication processes.

properties.name: secret
properties.description: Base64-encoded secret, encrypted with the bot's public RSA key, required for data decryption

properties.name: hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded data hash for data authentication

properties.name: data
properties.description: Base64-encoded encrypted JSON-serialized data with unique user's payload, data hashes and secrets required for EncryptedPassportElement decryption and authentication

name: setPassportDataErrors
description: Informs a user that some of the Telegram Passport elements they provided contains errors. The user will not be able to re-submit their Passport to you until the errors are fixed (the contents of the field for which you returned the error must change). Returns True on success.Use this if the data submitted by the user doesn't satisfy the standards your service requires for any reason. For example, if a birthday date seems invalid, a submitted document is blurry, a scan shows evidence of tampering, etc. Supply some details in the error message to make sure the user knows how to correct the issues.

properties.name: errors
properties.description: A JSON-serialized array describing the errors

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: User identifier

name: PassportElementError
description: This object represents an error in the Telegram Passport element which was submitted that should be resolved by the user. It should be one of:

name: PassportElementErrorDataField
description: Represents an issue in one of the data fields that was provided by the user. The error is considered resolved when the field's value changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: data_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded data hash

properties.name: field_name
properties.description: Name of the data field which has the error

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the error, one of “personal_details”, “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “address”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be data

name: PassportElementErrorFrontSide
description: Represents an issue with the front side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the front side of the document changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the front side of the document

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be front_side

name: PassportElementErrorReverseSide
description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the reverse side of the document

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “driver_license”, “identity_card”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be reverse_side

name: PassportElementErrorSelfie
description: Represents an issue with the selfie with a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the selfie changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the selfie

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be selfie

name: PassportElementErrorFile
description: Represents an issue with a document scan. The error is considered resolved when the file with the document scan changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded file hash

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be file

name: PassportElementErrorFiles
description: Represents an issue with a list of scans. The error is considered resolved when the list of files containing the scans changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hashes
properties.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

properties.name: type
properties.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be files

name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFile
description: Represents an issue with one of the files that constitute the translation of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file changes.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded file hash

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be translation_file

name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFiles
description: Represents an issue with the translated version of a document. The error is considered resolved when a file with the document translation change.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: file_hashes
properties.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “passport”, “driver_license”, “identity_card”, “internal_passport”, “utility_bill”, “bank_statement”, “rental_agreement”, “passport_registration”, “temporary_registration”

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be translation_files

name: PassportElementErrorUnspecified
description: Represents an issue in an unspecified place. The error is considered resolved when new data is added.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message

properties.name: element_hash
properties.description: Base64-encoded element hash

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue

properties.name: source
properties.description: Error source, must be unspecified

name: sendGame
description: Use this method to send a game. On success, the sent Message is returned.

properties.name: game_short_name
properties.description: Short name of the game, serves as the unique identifier for the game. Set up your games via @BotFather.

properties.name: chat_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target chat

properties.name: message_thread_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

properties.name: disable_notification
properties.description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

properties.name: protect_content
properties.description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving

properties.name: reply_to_message_id
properties.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

properties.name: allow_sending_without_reply
properties.description: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found

properties.name: reply_markup
properties.description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard. If empty, one 'Play game_title' button will be shown. If not empty, the first button must launch the game.

name: Game
description: This object represents a game. Use BotFather to create and edit games, their short names will act as unique identifiers.

properties.name: photo
properties.description: Photo that will be displayed in the game message in chats.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of the game

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the game

properties.name: text
properties.description: Optional. Brief description of the game or high scores included in the game message. Can be automatically edited to include current high scores for the game when the bot calls setGameScore, or manually edited using editMessageText. 0-4096 characters.

properties.name: text_entities
properties.description: Optional. Special entities that appear in text, such as usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: Optional. Animation that will be displayed in the game message in chats. Upload via BotFather

name: CallbackGame
description: A placeholder, currently holds no information. Use BotFather to set up your game.

name: setGameScore
description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game message. On success, if the message is not an inline message, the Message is returned, otherwise True is returned. Returns an error, if the new score is not greater than the user's current score in the chat and force is False.

properties.name: score
properties.description: New score, must be non-negative

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: User identifier

properties.name: force
properties.description: Pass True if the high score is allowed to decrease. This can be useful when fixing mistakes or banning cheaters

properties.name: disable_edit_message
properties.description: Pass True if the game message should not be automatically edited to include the current scoreboard

properties.name: chat_id
properties.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat

properties.name: message_id
properties.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the sent message

properties.name: inline_message_id
properties.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message

name: getGameHighScores
description: Use this method to get data for high score tables. Will return the score of the specified user and several of their neighbors in a game. Returns an Array of GameHighScore objects.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Target user id

properties.name: chat_id
properties.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat

properties.name: message_id
properties.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the sent message

properties.name: inline_message_id
properties.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message

name: GameHighScore
description: This object represents one row of the high scores table for a game.

properties.name: score
properties.description: Score

properties.name: user
properties.description: User

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position in high score table for the game
